Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the receipt of catalytic converters by junk dealers and scrap dealers
Summary: Places limitations on transactions involving the sale of catalytic converters to junk dealers, junk yard owners or operators, or scrap metal processors or scrap metal processing facilities; relates to record keeping relating to transactions involving the sale of catalytic converters.
LawCode: Add ยง62-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the receipt of catalytic converters by junk dealers and scrap dealers
